Class CsvExportService.Builder

java.lang.Object
com.arbergashi.charts.export.CsvExportService.Builder
Enclosing class:
CsvExportService
public static final class CsvExportService.Builder extends Object
Builder for configuring CSV export options.

Example

CsvExportService.builder()
    .delimiter(';')           // European format
    .decimalSeparator(',')    // European decimal
    .includeHeader(true)
    .headerNames("Zeit", "Wert", "Gewicht")
    .export(model, file);
Since:
2.0.0
Author:
Arber Gashi

    • excelCompatible

      public CsvExportService.Builder excelCompatible(boolean compatible)
      Enables Excel compatibility mode.

      When enabled:

      • Adds UTF-8 BOM for proper encoding detection
      • Uses CRLF line endings
      Parameters:
      compatible - true for Excel compatibility
      Returns:
      this builder

      Sets the numeric precision (decimal places).
      Parameters:
